def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes.Entidades import MFOrdemAquisicaoExterna
entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = MFOrdemAquisicaoExterna.PodeCancelar(entity.Fields["ORDEMSERVICO"].Handle)
